## TextCanvasParameters interface

\[\[TextCanvas\]\] construction parameters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TextCanvasParameters 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [backgroundMaterial](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvasparameters.backgroundmaterial.md) | THREE.Material | Material used to render text background. |
|  [fontCatalog](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvasparameters.fontcatalog.md) | [FontCatalog](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.md) | Initial \[\[FontCatalog\]\]. |
|  [material](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvasparameters.material.md) | THREE.Material | Material used to render text. |
|  [maxGlyphCount](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvasparameters.maxglyphcount.md) | number | Maximum amount of glyphs each \[\[TextCanvas\]\] layer can store. |
|  [minGlyphCount](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvasparameters.minglyphcount.md) | number | Minimum amount of glyphs each \[\[TextCanvas\]\] layer can store. |
|  [renderer](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvasparameters.renderer.md) | THREE.WebGLRenderer | WebGLRenderer internally used by this <code>TextCanvas</code>. |
